job.title: Data Analytics Engineer
job.description:
Analytics Engineer who will be responsible for building and maintaining complex systems for the purpose of aggregating, visualizing and interpreting critical business data sets.

What Your Day Will Look Like
  • Drive the design, development, and maintenance of innovative and scalable intelligence solutions across the organization, with the highest standards of analytical rigor and data integrity.
  • Solicit input from business partners in marketing to define problems and propose solutions including supporting overall data strategies and partnership pipelines
  • Develop domain expertise and drive major contributions to our data and research roadmap. Leverage our analytics tools to uncover deep business insights and trends.
  • Build upon and document our common data framework so that all data can be connected, clean, and ready for analysis.
  • Help to define and improve our internal standards for style, maintainability, and best practices for a high-scale data infrastructure. Write clean, maintainable and well-documented code to support our data processes.
  • Translate ambiguous business problem statements into actionable analytical solutions.
  • Manage large scale data requests and projects to define requirements, manage timelines, and coordinate activities with other involved team members.
  • Proactively identify and implement solutions to reduce manual data entry wherever possible.
  • Strong verbal/written communication & data presentation skills, including an ability to effectively communicate with business leaders and technical teams
IDEAL CANDIDATES WILL HAVE
  • Bachelor’s Degree in quantitative field and/or equivalent work experience or education
  • Expert SQL knowledge (5+years), ability to write efficient and optimized code
  • Experience (3+years) with Modern scripting languages (e.g. Python)
  • Experience with Data visualization and dashboarding tools (Tableau, Salesforce, Looker, etc)
  • Proven ability to solve complex quantitative business challenges.
  • Cloud data pipelines (e.g Fivetran, Stitch)
  • Google Cloud ecosystem
  • Positive attitude
  • Entrepreneurial mindset (able to work independently as well as with a team)
  • Intellectual curiosity
  • Strong interpersonal and communication skills
  • High level of accuracy and attention to detail
